ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(( EthnicityOfParticipants_M_ori__c + EthnicityOfParticipants_Non_M_ori__c + EthnicityOfParticipants_DidNotRespond__c ) <> ( Participation_NoOfParticipants__c ), True, False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: TOTAL PARTICIPANTS NOT MATCHING WITH 'ETHNICITY OF PARTICIPANTS'
